column4: i just installed pan a newsreader and it's asking for a signature file... how do i create a sig file? thx
is it safe to use bittorrent? is it nothing like kazaa? thx
it doesnt make my system vulnerable to hackers or trojans? :-/
shouldn't do. you just have to worry about the feds
i'm not really sure what am talkin about just want to be safe than sorry
ha ha if i download that's not a problem right? if i share then thats the time the feds will go after me
bittorrent shares while it downloads, as i understand it
i d/l this thing called bittornado client
that's what makes it all work :)
right, then if that's the case why does bittorrent still exist?
not everything is illegal to share
i have this thing called firestarter installed does that make my comp safer?
you could equally ask why http still exists...
